item.description:

item.description:
Crypto price prediction today reports Bitcoin has broken a fresh all-time high at $122,838, while altcoins XRP and ADA, meme heavyweight DOGE, and newcomer presale token Snorter have posted multi-month highs. Analysts view the moves as momentum toward a possible extended bull cycle.

item.title: Tron Founder Justin Sun Becomes Latest To Board Bezos’ Blue Origin Rocket
item.description:
Justin Sun has been announced for Blue Origin’s upcoming NS-34 flight, joining others on a date yet to be confirmed. The TRON founder earlier paid $28 million for a seat and has since boosted stakes in Trump-linked WLFI and $TRUMP tokens after U.S. securities charges were dropped.

The post Tron Founder Justin Sun Becomes Latest To Board Bezos’ Blue Origin Rocket appeared first on Cryptonews.

item.title: Mesa 25.3 Merges Vulkan WSI  Support For Using Atomic Mode-Setting
item.description: A nearly five year old merge request was merged today to Mesa Git for Q4's Mesa 25.3 release. This merge transitions the Vulkan windowing system integration (WSI) from using the DRM "legacy" kernel mode-setting APIs over to the modern atomic mode-setting interfaces...

item.title: Hackers Exploit SharePoint Zero-Day Since July 7 to Steal Keys, Maintain Persistent Access
item.description:
